title: mapjs json theme schema
description: mapjs themes, which can appear both as a separate file, or as part of an argview `.json` file, which adds some meta-data fields (e.g. map_id) to mapjs.json and mapjs.mup format generated by argmap, mapjs or argivew apps. Should also be compatible with MindMup files, but hasn't been tested thoroughly. $id's folder URI follows semantic versioning with major and minor versioning only, starting from 3 to match the mapjs `formatVersion` field.

weight.$comment: Should pick just string or integer?
weight.title: The weight Schema

lineSpacing.$comment: lineSpacing vs lineSpacingPx? Is former integer and latter number?
lineSpacing.title: The lineSpacing Schema

lineSpacingPx.$comment: lineSpacing vs lineSpacingPx? Is former integer and latter number?
lineSpacingPx.title: The lineSpacingPx Schema

connector-type.title: The connector-type Schema, which applies to a number of groups

$schema.description: $schema's folder URI follows semantic versioning with major and minor versioning only, starting from 3 to match the mapjs `formatVersion` field.
$schema.title: The $schema Schema

id.title: The id Schema
id.description: Use this to identify the theme's URI, either with repo local path or a URL.

name.title: The name Schema
name.description: Use this to add a short title for the scheme

description.title: The description Schema
description.description: Use this to add notes about the theme, including its purpose
examples: argmap theme, adapted from theme used in original argmap github repo.

deprecated.title: The deprecated Schema
deprecated.description: Used to mark theme files or properties as deprecated, which means it will lose support. Theme description should explain why, and describe the best theme to use instead.

default.description: default is a type of group

supporting-group.description: supporting-group is a type of group

opposing-group.description: opposing-group is a type of group

no-connector.opposing-group.description: no-connector.opposing-group is a type of group

no-connector.supporting-group.description: no-connector.supporting-group is a type of group

no-connector.description: default is a type of group
